title: Show 67 - Heidi Allen (LIVE)
itunes:title: Show 67 - Heidi Allen (LIVE)
itunes:subtitle: Heidi Allen MPHeidi Allen has only been an MP fâ€¦
description:
Heidi Allen MP Heidi Allen has only been an MP for three years but has already had a huge impact on British politics. Her honesty and passion are part of her refreshing approach to politics. In this funny and frank interview, she tells Matt about where her own politics come from, her hope from the future and spraying motorbikes. Oh and Amber Rudd's gifs... You can vote for The Political Party in the British Podcast Awards here: https://www.britishpodcastawards.com/vote/ You can follow Heidi here: @heidiallen75 You can follow Matt here: @mattforde

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
